scenario_text.value:
Perfect timing.
I wanted to ask you something.
Okay. What?
Do you still like Agumon?
Of course. He’s my trusted partner.
Really?

I’m glad to hear it.
But not everyone feels that way.

It’s okay. Kaito and Minoru will understand
when they calm down a bit.
I don’t want them to fight, though...
It’s all my fault, isn’t it?

If I hadn’t suggested going to the shrine
we wouldn’t have ended up in this world...
Don’t worry, Miu...
Is Ryo...really dead?

I think so.
He was swallowed up by that fog...

Oh...
So do you hate me?
Hate you? Why would I?

I took everyone to the shrine,
and now we’re stuck here...
S-so...you must really hate me.
Takuma, you should say something to her.

She acts like she’s doing fine,
but in fact she’s struggling.

(Poor Miu...
She looks like she’s gonna cry.)

(No wonder, if she’s blaming herself for
all the horrible things that happened.)

(But it’s not her fault.
I should make sure she knows that.)
(What should I say?)
It’s not your fault.
You’re overworrying.
Don’t regret the past.

It’s not your fault.
You shouldn’t feel responsible.
B-but...

It’s not like you knew this was going
to happen.

I know it’s not something you can just
shrug off, but still...
You can’t go around blaming yourself, either.
Yeah... *sob*

D-Don’t cry!
Sorry, did I say too much?

No, it’s okay.
I feel better now.

I just need a little time, that’s all.
Thank you, Takuma.

(She IS the one who led us to the shrine.
There’s no denying that...)

You’re overworrying.
You didn’t do it on purpose.

Regret won’t bring Ryo back.
Look ahead to the future, and...

*sob* You’re right, but...
Because of me, Ryo is... He’s...
Waaaaaaaaah!

Hey, it’s not your fault, okay?
There’s no use crying about it!
Uh... I mean... Um...

(I didn’t mean to be so harsh.
Sorry, Miu...)

You didn’t bring us here on purpose.
Don’t regret the past.
Yeah, I guess, but... *sob*

Let’s use this time to be productive instead.
We’re gonna make it back somehow!

Okay.
I’ll try to keep it...together...
Waaaaaaaaah!
Don’t cry, Miu.

Thanks for being so nice to her, Takuma.
But...I think she needs more time.

Leave the rest to me.
She just needs to cry it out.

Got it.
Sorry I couldn’t help more.

Oh, but you did.
What you said definitely helped her.
Ahh...

(It’s on her to feel better now.
I should just leave her be.)
